description: Special IDF troops have trained over the past 15 years for heavy fighting in urban areas. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Israel faces risky choices in vow to destroy Hamas, as option of street-to-street combat looms
title_page: Israel faces risky choices in vow to destroy Hamas, as option of street-to-street combat looms | The Straits Times
maintext:
LONDON â€“ Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu faces difficult decisions.
He and his government have vowed to destroy Hamas, the Palestinian militant organisation responsible for killing more than 1,300 Israelis in the single-biggest attack ever suffered by the Jewish state.
